first_para: Gerard "Gerry" Sutcliffe (born 13 May 1953) is a British Labour Party politician who was Member of Parliament (MP) for Bradford South from 1994 to 2015, and was the Minister for Sport and Tourism in the Brown Government.

full.extract:
Gerard "Gerry" Sutcliffe (born 13 May 1953) is a British Labour Party politician who was Member of Parliament (MP) for Bradford South from 1994 to 2015, and was the Minister for Sport and Tourism in the Brown Government.
In May 2014 Sutcliffe announced that he will stand down at the next general election.
^ "Sutcliffe to stand down". Dewsbury Reporter. 28 May 2014. Retrieved 28 May 2014.
full.title: Gerry Sutcliffe
